argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grppropstr.b | |- ( Base ` K ) = B |
| 2 |  | grppropstr.p | |- ( +g ` K ) = .+ |
| 3 |  | grppropstr.l | |- L = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. } |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` K ) e. _V |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_eqeltrri | |- B e. _V |
| 6 | 3 | #P_grpbase | |- ( B e. _V -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- B = ( Base ` L ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_eqtri | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( +g ` K ) e. _V |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_eqeltrri | |- .+ e. _V |
| 11 | 3 | #P_grpplusg | |- ( .+ e. _V -> .+ = ( +g ` L ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- .+ = ( +g ` L ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_eqtri | |- ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` L ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_grpprop | |- ( K e. Grp <-> L e. Grp ) |
